Comment: The Justice Department has opened a civil rights investigation into the Minneapolis-area Hennepin County Attorney’s Office’s new directive for its prosecutors to consider race when negotiating plea deals with criminal defendants.   Excellent Pam, continue this great work and exposing and prosecuting those who commit criminal acts.
Author: Sure-Wishbone-4293

Comment: Justice is supposed to be blind, so race cannot be any consideration.
Author: mdws1977

Comment: Agreed. The court’s directive is overt racism peeling away the gains of the Civil Rights Movement. MLK Jr. is spinning in his grave with this shit.
Author: Achmetan
